member.name: T:AdaptiveCards.Templating.AdaptiveCardTemplate
member.summary:
The main AdaptiveCardTemplate class Contain all methods for performaing data binding to AdaptiveCardTemplate
Expand

member.name: M:AdaptiveCards.Templating.AdaptiveCardTemplate.#ctor(System.Object)

remarks.para: Once created, it will contain a parsed tree based on jsonTemplate
Data is bound by calling Expand on the object
The intance can be rebound with different data by calling Expand

member.param: string in json or seriazable object

member.name: M:AdaptiveCards.Templating.AdaptiveCardTemplate.Expand(AdaptiveCards.Templating.EvaluationContext,System.Func{System.String,System.Object})
member.summary: Bind data in to the instance of AdaptiveCardTemplate

remarks.para: Data can be also inlined in AdaptiveCardTemplate payload
Expand can be called multiple times with different or same
Returned string can be invalid AdaptiveCards, such validation will be performed by AdaptiveCards Parser
defines behavior when no suitable data is found for a template entry
Default behavior is leaving templated string unchanged

member.param: defines behavior when no suitable data is found for a template entry

member.name: M:AdaptiveCards.Templating.AdaptiveCardTemplate.Expand(System.Object,System.Func{System.String,System.Object})
member.summary: Create a root data context using , and bind it to the instance of AdaptiveCardTemplate

remarks.para: Data can be also inlined in AdaptiveCardTemplate payload
Expand can be called multiple times with different or same
Returned string can be invalid AdaptiveCards, such validation will be performed by AdaptiveCards Parser
defines behavior when no suitable data is found for a template entry
Default behavior is leaving templated string unchanged

member.param: Serializable object or a string in valid json format that will be used as data context
Defines behavior when no suitable data is found for a template entry
